resources.string: Hold your camera still, shoot the first one photo
Hold your camera still, move object you want to clone the first two photos taken
Hold your camera still, move clone shooting the first three pictures again
Align picture error, please move the phone in horizontal direction
Please move the phone slowly when capturing
current quality do not support slow motion
This encoder type does not support video resolution
Video snapshot size lower than video size. Capping to Video size. Please select a resolution higher or equal to the current video size
We do not support picture resolution in Low Power Mode. Video size snapshot will be taken. Please select High power mode for picture size
The resolution is only suitable for video size snapshot.
Unable to connect to the camera.
Camera has been disabled because of security policies
Unable to select in scene mode.

"An error occurred while generating a panorama photo. Please move the camera steadily during shooting"
"Get your device ready. Step out of the camera for a moment."

Turn off the flash when the battery power is low
Put name card at the center of screen and press shutter button.
The phone storage is running out of space. Delete some images or other files
Failed to read the DCIM directory, please reboot your phone
The camera is unavailable now because USB mass storage is enabled
<<< Please press the Shutter key and move your phone slowly in one direction. >>>
Camera conflict, please turn off flashlight
Camera conflict, please exit from flashlight and try again
Media recorder is busy. Please close related application.
Shoot twice and combine into one photo
You can shoot unlimited photos and combine.
Click Done button to finish shooting
"Hold your camera still to take three photos, the first one is background, then get different parts from another two and combine with the first photo."
Reserve the bright part of each photo after combination
Reserve the dark part of each photo after combination
Shoot twice, and shoot half each time
Hold your camera still and shoot a foreground
Hold your camera still and shoot another foreground
Adjust the transparency of the shot photo
Click the Shutter button or select one photo from your local memory
Press and hold the Shutter button to wake up your phone
You must select at least three photos
Hold your camera still when shooting
Press and hold the Shutter button to enter the camera when the screen is off
Focus on white paper or grey cardboard, and click the button to measure.
Press and hold the Camcorder button to shoot and release it to pause
Press and hold the Camcorder button to shoot again.
Unable to create items because the storage device cannot be accessed
Unable to add the audio track.

Unable to remove the audio track
Unable to create items due to an error
Unable to export movies due to an error

Unable to delete items due to an error
Unable to add the photo to your item

Hold your phone still when shooting
Please select the object you want to remove.
Do not support continuous snapshots when Lens-Filter is On
The storage is running out of space
Keep your camera still when shooting in the darkness, then draw the desired pattern in the air with a flashlight.
"Use a tripod when shooting in the darkness under the clear sky"
Changed to internal phone storage because the SD card is unavailable
Change the storage location to SD card?
Please make sure your camera is not used by any other application or try rebooting your phone
No Camera was Detected. It is recommended to contact the customer service for processing
Double click the Volume key or Bluetooth Finder to capture snapshots without opening camera.
Double click the Volume key to capture snapshots when the screen is off
You can take three photos with different exposure level
Do not support the selected photos, please select %s pixels photos again
Press Exit again and save videos
Photographing course will show you how to shoot an excellent photo

"\u0009\u0009Galaxy Photoing allows you to shoot the Milky Way that stars are running around through long-time exposure. \u0009\u0009Try to select a bright and starry night and use a tripod while taking photos in a dark environment."

"\u0009\u0009Star Track allows you shoot the track of star movement through long-time exposure. \u0009\u0009Try to select a bright and starry night and use a tripod while taking photos in a dark environment."
"\u0009\u0009Light Painting allows you shoot the track of light sources movement through long-time exposure. \u0009\u0009Please taking photos in a dark environment."
"\u0009\u0009Crystal is suitable to shoot a static object because it brings you a transparent and exquisite picture. \u0009\u0009Please use a tripod while taking photos."

"\u0009\u0009Electronic Aperture is a kind of aperture priority shooting mode. You can adjust the size of the aperture, and the camera will automatically adjust the shutter speed. \u0009\u0009It is suitable for you to shoot a static landscape, night view, still object or slowly moving object."

"\u0009\u0009Slow Shutter is a kind of slow shutter shooting mode, which allows you to adjust the exposure time. \u0009\u0009It is suitable for you to shoot scenes with insufficient light, animated objects such as human beings, vehicles, rain/snow, misty waves or colorful light track."
Know About Depth of Field Prediction
"\u0009\u0009Depth of Field Prediction marks the sharp contrast part with red lines on the objects with the same DOF. \u0009\u0009The red area is the clearly focused part."
Click here to cancel the deletion
